Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class ImageProvider

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.ImageProvider
public class ImageProvider extends Object
The ImageProvider class provides methods to get BufferedImage objects of the game elements, like students, assistants, professors, etc. Images are cached to avoid reading them from disk over and over again.
